name: Tower Builder (itch) (David Liao)
description:
Game Description:

This game is an elaboration project based on the original narrative game (https://bfod.itch.io/array-clone-assignment ). Players of Tower Builder will get three kinds of card randomly. The box card will lay down one box, and the tool card will reinforce one box while wind card can blow away all the unreinforced boxes. The winner of the game is whoever’s tower reaches the third floor at first.

 

Genre:

Card Game; Single-player;

Play Instruction:

Hover over the card to see its function and left-click card to play it
